text:
Lifesum | Stockholm | Multiple roles | Onsite | https://lifesum.com/

Lifesum's a Stockholm-based tech startup with a vision to make it simple for people everywhere to form habits that build towards healthier, happier lives. We're a team of ~55 people with over 30m registered users, multiply featured by both Apple and Google for our work.

DIRECTOR OF DATA

We are looking for a new lead for our team of 5 data scientists, doing both product and company analytics for our mobile health app. We have a small but talented team, mostly PhDs in computational science or health-related areas. We use BigQuery/Airflow for data warehousing, Firebase for mobile analytics, and Jupyter + Tableau for investigation.

http://jobs.lifesum.com/jobs/128230-director-of-data

SOFTWARE ENGINEER (ANDROID)

We are looking for a senior Android developer to join our mobile team. We are a mobile-first company with a top-rate Android client, along with Wear OS, Google Fit, S-Health and Google Assistant integrations.

http://jobs.lifesum.com/jobs/118299-software-engineer-androi...

We are looking for local or EU/UK candidates at this stage.

Shoot me an email if you're interested, or apply directly!

Lars Yencken (VP Tech; lars@lifesum.com)
